prefercite.p:

did.unittitle:
Association to Aid
Scientific Research for Women, 1922-1928

Cornell United
Religious Work, Freshman Camp (Women),
1940-1942

National Association
of Deans of Women, 1935-1938

Miss Fitch - Personal
speaking engagements; letters from former CU students; one letter from Mary
Donlon, (11-23-1934), 1935-1937

Housing for Colored
Women Students (infor on rooming or apts. downtown houses),
1939-1940

Miss Nye - Personal
(mainly letters written by Miss Fitch after Miss Nye became ill),
1935

Reports of the Dean of
Women, 1940-1942

Folder has no title,
but seems to concern expenses in general,
1916-1919

Medical Dept. Dr
Young's Nutrition Project, 1943-1944

Furniture for #1 Sage
Ave. Miss Brummett, 1941-1942

Women's Self-Govt.
Association Executive Committee Minutes,
1949-1953

Folder without title
(contains a few prints),

Curtiss-Wright
Program: ind. list of "cadettes", mainly re: housing in Comstock A&B,
1943

Association Judiciary Committee Minutes,
1948-1949

Problems and Interviews, 1945

Committee Correspondence and Memoranda,
1924-1930
